A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was so good\, the reviews had been bad so I had low expectations but I didn't stop smiling the whole movie. Finally a plot where I didn't see what was coming every moment. They stayed away from the stupid nostalgia that has been ruining everything lately\, and were able to incorporate those lighthearted moments and jokes naturally instead of in a \"oh aren't we so Star Wars witty\" way. I loved it\, my favorite so far\, I can't wait to see the new trilogy from this director in the future. ??????
